text: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye is a 2000 Bollywood movie. It was directed by K. Muralimohana Rao. The movie stars Salman Khan and Rani Mukherji . The movie also features Jackie Shroff, Raveena Tandon, Mohnish Behl, Pooja Batra, Shakti Kapoor in supporting roles. Its music director was Himesh Reshammiya. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 movies Category:2000s Indian movies
title: Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye
